remarks: The function operation expressed as a mapping with function values. (Contributed by AV, 6-Apr-2019.)
statement:
offvalfv.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
offvalfv.f $e |- ( ph -> F Fn A ) $.
offvalfv.g $e |- ( ph -> G Fn A ) $.
offvalfv $p |- ( ph -> ( F oF R G ) = ( x e. A |-> ( ( F ` x ) R ( G ` x ) ) ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d F x $.
$d G x $.
$d R x $.
$d ph x $.
